title: Tom Weaver from Casey
itunes:title: Tom Weaver from Casey
description:
NEW BAND YOU NEED TO HEAR ALERT! I had Tom Weaver from Casey on the show this week. If you dig bands like Touche Amore, La Dispute and Pianos Become the Teeth…dive in and thank me later. We tackle the topics of confidence, health issues and learning from past mistakes. It’s a fun chat! Get yourself the tools you need with Acer’s new laptop, the Swift 5. Get 10% off by using the code 100WORDS plus free shipping! Change your life with So Delicious Almond Milk w/ Cashew! No joke, best almond milk in the game. Get educated. URM Academy is the best online school for anything production related! You must try it out! Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show! Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
